subject: Affiliate program
description_text:
Hello,

I created an affiliate program for your brand, but the promo code is LESSIMRACERSX and I would like the code to be LSX. Could you please tell me how to make the change? Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi CASTRO Grégory,     I have already made the changes for you.

Hi,
Perfect! Thanks a lot.

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
